name: FRAM Ultra Synthetic Oil Filter, XG5

reviews.name: FRAM Ultra Synthetic Oil Filter, XG5
reviews.reviewText: I have over 50+ years mechanical experience & with various brands of engine oil and related filters. Fram continues to be a primary brand of choice for most shops and this particular "Xtended Guard" model is the best of the group typically made for newer hi-tech engines, esp those running high temp synthetics.
reviews.title: Best Fram Filter of the group.

reviews.name: FRAM Ultra Synthetic Oil Filter, XG5
reviews.title: it,s a oil filter

reviews.name: FRAM Ultra Synthetic Oil Filter, XG5
reviews.reviewText: Great product at the best price around! I use these in all of my vehicles in conjunction with 5w30 full synthetic. I change oil at 7-10,000 miles and all of my vehicles are going strong at 242,000, 190,000 and 168,000 miles. You will get better mileage and reliability!
reviews.title: Great product at the best price around!

reviews.name: FRAM Ultra Synthetic Oil Filter, XG5
reviews.reviewText: Have been using this filter since I bought my 2009 Dodge Caliber SXT with very good results. I change the oil between 4000 to 5000 miles and the oil is still mostly clean. Not black like the engines back in the 80's. And I also use Lucas Heavy duty Stabilizer in every oil change. Have 62,000 miles on the engine/car.
reviews.title: FRAM Extended Guard Oil Filter, XG10060

reviews.name: FRAM Ultra Synthetic Oil Filter, XG5
reviews.reviewText: Finally Fram came out with the ULTRA in the cartridge I needed.I change my own oil so I don't mind paying for what I consider the best products.The Fram filters are the best in my opinion and even though this is a cartridge style it was the innovative Sure-Grip technology that made me a Fram loyalist on the regular style oil filters.
reviews.title: Waited for this!
